description.value: Character can choose to use this talent at the start of combat after rolling intiative. If Activated, the radius of their Power of Da Waaagh! Talent becomes 5*Willpower Bonus Metres.

system.benefit: Character can choose to use this talent at the start of combat after rolling intiative. If Activated, the radius of their Power of Da Waaagh! Talent becomes 5*Willpower Bonus Metres.

prerequisites.text: Ork Weirdboy, Da Power of Waaagh!, Willpower 40
